mapper.select: select ii.*, product.name product_name, product.scale product_scale, product.product_index product_index from ord_checkin_order_item ii, ent_product product where ii.sys_status = 1 and product.sys_status = 1 and ii.product_id = product.id and ii.checkin_order_id = #{id} order by product.product_index

select checkinOrder.*, carrier.name carrier, in_order_recorder.name in_order_recorder from ord_checkin_order checkinOrder, ent_carrier carrier, ent_in_order_recorder in_order_recorder where checkinOrder.sys_status = 1 and checkinOrder.carrier_id = carrier.id and checkinOrder.in_order_recorder_id = in_order_recorder.id
and concat(checkinOrder.checkin_date, carrier.name, in_order_recorder.name) like "%${keyword}%"
and checkinOrder.created_time >= #{bound_time}
order by if(isnull(checkinOrder.modified_time),0,checkinOrder.modified_time) desc,checkinOrder.created_time desc

select checkinOrder.*, carrier.name carrier, in_order_recorder.name in_order_recorder from ord_checkin_order checkinOrder, ent_carrier carrier, ent_in_order_recorder in_order_recorder where checkinOrder.sys_status = 1 and checkinOrder.carrier_id = carrier.id and checkinOrder.in_order_recorder_id = in_order_recorder.id and checkinOrder.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into ord_checkin_order ( id, checkin_date, in_order_recorder_id, carrier_id, remarks, creator_id, created_time, modified_time ) values ( #{id}, #{checkin_date}, #{in_order_recorder_id}, #{carrier_id}, #{remarks}, #{creator_id}, now(), now() )
mapper.update: update ord_checkin_order set checkin_date = #{checkin_date}, in_order_recorder_id = #{in_order_recorder_id}, carrier_id = #{carrier_id}, remarks = #{remarks} , modifier_id = #{modifier_id} , modified_time = now() where id = #{id}
mapper.delete: update ord_checkin_order set sys_status = 0, modifier_id = #{modifier_id}, modified_time = now() where id=#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into ord_checkin_order_item ( id, checkin_order_id, product_id, quantity, remarks, creator_id, created_time, modified_time ) values ( uuid(), #{checkin_order_id}, #{product_id}, #{quantity}, #{remarks}, #{creator_id}, now(), now() )
mapper.update: update ord_checkin_order_item set quantity = #{quantity}, remarks = #{remarks} , modifier_id = #{modifier_id} , modified_time = now() where id = #{id}
mapper.delete: update ord_checkin_order_item set sys_status = 0, modified_time = now() where checkin_order_id=#{checkin_order_id}
mapper.select: select checkinOrder.*, carrier.name carrier, in_order_recorder.name in_order_recorder from ord_checkin_order checkinOrder, ent_carrier carrier, ent_in_order_recorder in_order_recorder where checkinOrder.sys_status = 1 and checkinOrder.carrier_id = carrier.id and checkinOrder.in_order_recorder_id = in_order_recorder.id and checkinOrder.checkin_date = #{checkin_date} order by if(isnull(checkinOrder.modified_time),0,checkinOrder.modified_time) desc,checkinOrder.created_time desc
